text: 161:3 Thus far the hymn which has to be recited by the Hot ri priest, after the eating of the ri tugrabas, has been considered. What follows next is the so-called Pra-uga hymn, consisting of seven t ri k as, which the Hot ri has to recite after the Vi s vedevagraha. Different S âkhâs recommend hymns of different metres, our S âkhâ fixes on the Gâyatrî.
